_description: Maps Telegram user IDs to their assistant bot credentials. When a developer deploys VZ Assistant, it will automatically use the bot configured for their user ID instead of creating a new one.
_usage: Add new developers here with their user ID and bot credentials. The userbot will automatically detect and use the correct bot based on the logged-in user.

assistant_bot.description:
Asisten untuk VzUserbot.. dengan string Telethone + Uvloop dan Pyrogram + Trio

Contact Founder jika menemukan masalah.. OWNER : Vzoel Fox's ( Lutpan ) @VZLfxs @itspizolpoks

fallback._comment: Default behavior when user ID is not found in developers list
